headline: Does the Recent Bank of America Rally Still Leave Room for Further Gains in 2025?
summary: Wondering if Bank of America is still worth buying after its big run over the years, or if most of the upside is already priced in? In this article we unpack what the market is signaling about its true value. The stock has climbed 2.1% over the last week, 1.0% over the past month, and is up 22.1% year to date, adding to a longer term gain of 110.8% over five years. This puts recent moves into a much bigger context. Recent headlines have focused on large US banks navigating higher for longer...
